activities: i9 Advantage is the leading-edge provider of the most trusted suite of cloud-based Form I-9 and E-Verify® employment verification software. Our electronic I-9 product suite delivers solutions for creating, managing, and storing new Form I-9s; automated digitization and correction of existing paper Form I-9s; and mobile-enabled remote hire solutions.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, United Kingdom
